titleStmt.title: Lancasters massacre, or, The nevv vvay of advancing the Protestant religion and expressing loyaltie to the King and Queen namely to cut the throats of Protestant men, women and innocent children as lately the papists and malignants did at Lancaster / related in a letter from a Gentleman of great note in Lancashire, to a friend in London ...
titleStmt.author: J. H.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
